meta.title: Motive for Murder
meta.description: Two murders, months apart, in Houston. The young victims knew each other, but did they also know their elusive killer? Dateline’s Josh Mankiewicz takes you inside one of the most twisted and confounding cases he’s ever covered. From the team who brought you the #1 podcast The Thing About Pam comes the chilling story of the race to find a killer by unmasking the motive.
meta.author: NBC News

episodes.title: 2 - Was it Love?

episodes.title: 1 - A Scream. Then Silence.
episodes.description: She was a small woman with a big voice. And then she was gone.
episodes.summary: She was a small woman with a big voice. And then she was gone.

episodes.title: Introducing Motive for Murder
episodes.description: From the team who brought you the #1 podcast The Thing About Pam, comes Motive for Murder. Dateline’s Josh Mankiewicz takes you inside the chilling story of the race to find a killer by unmasking the motive. Motive for Murder premieres May 7th. Subscribe now.
